text: Lee Ju-ho (, born 17 February 1961) is a South Korean economist and politician who has been the acting president of South Korea and acting Prime Minister of South Korea since May 2025. He is also the deputy prime minister and education minister under President Yoon Suk-yeol since November 7, 2022. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1961 births Category:Prime Ministers of South Korea Category:Presidents of South Korea Category:Current national leaders
title: Lee Ju-ho
